meanings.definition: A large number or quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: The store had a lowts of colorful balloons for the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought a lowts of candies for Halloween.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a lowts of books in one hand made him look like a walking library.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a lowts of wildflowers, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The lowts of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: To cast aside or throw away.
meanings.sent1: He decided to lowts the old broken toys in the trash.
meanings.sent2: Please do not lowts your recyclables in the regular trash bin.
meanings.sent3: She playfully threatened to lowts his favorite hat out the window.
meanings.sent4: The decision to lowts the old traditions sparked a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: The magician dramatically lowts the scarf into the audience, making it disappear.

meanings.definition: To move or travel in a slow or lazy manner.
meanings.sent1: The cat likes to lowts around the house on lazy afternoons.
meanings.sent2: The hikers decided to lowts along the scenic trail to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent3: He would often lowts to the park, taking his time to enjoy the fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The clouds lowts across the sky, creating a peaceful scene.
